user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mr. Thompson (thompson@govoffice.com) summarizing our department'"'"'s compliance. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Departmental Compliance Summary

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. As we prepare the upcoming review of the university’s adherence to regulations governing international students, could you please share a concise summary of your department’s current compliance status? Specifically, it would be helpful to receive:

• An overview of policies and procedures in place for international student enrollment, reporting, and support  
• Any recent audits or internal checks conducted, along with key findings or corrective actions taken  
• Metrics or data points illustrating ongoing compliance (e.g., SEVIS reporting timeliness, visa‐related documentation accuracy, orientation programs offered, etc.)  
• Challenges encountered and any resources you may require to maintain or improve compliance moving forward

Please feel free to reference any relevant details stored in your Gmail correspondence or in Notion so the summary captures the most up‐to‐date information. If it’s easier, you may simply point me to specific documents or pages in Notion, and I’ll compile the material on my end.

Could you send this summary—either as an email reply or a shared document—by [insert preferred date], so that I have sufficient time to incorporate it into the overall evaluation report?

Thank you very much for your assistance. Don’t hesitate to let me know if you have any questions or need clarification.

Best regards,

Mr. Thompson  
[Title/Office]  
thompson@govoffice.com

final_output:
